document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh's injuries from a rocket attack on his palace at the weekend were more serious than previously reported, a yemeni official said, raising further questions about his rule.
document.title: yemen's saleh injuries believed more serious
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh's injuries from a rocket attack on his palace at the weekend were more serious than previously reported, a yemeni official said, raising further questions about his rule.
